availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Arthur F. Dobyns (Mason County, Kentucky, magistrate)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, magistrate. Kentucky native. Married to Lamira Dobyns. Father of Arthur Dobyns, Mary Dobyns, Octavia Dobyns, Elizabeth Dobyns, Martha Dobyns, Rebecca Dobyns, Anna Dobyns, Frances Dobyns, and Emily Dobyns. Magistrate in Mason County from c1860 to c1880.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 460. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 647. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 38. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, p. 3. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Dover, p. 9.
